actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to permit members of national securities exchanges to effect certain transactions with respect to accounts for which such members exercise investment discretion.

summary.text: Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to repeal the prohibition against the execution of transactions by members of national securities exchanges with respect to accounts for which they exercise investment discretion. Authorizes the Securities and Exchange Commission to require such members to: (1) obtain express authorization prior to executing accounts with respect to which they exercise investment discretion; and (2) disclose annually the aggregate compensation they received for executing the transactions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to permit members of national securities exchanges to effect certain transactions with respect to accounts for which such members exercise investment discretion.
